item.title: Butternut Squash Curry
item.description: Ingredients 300g red lentils, dried 1 butternut squash, small cubes 1 onion, finely chopped 2-3 garlic cloves, finely chopped 400ml coconut milk (1 can) 400ml diced tomatoes (1 can) 1 Tbsp curry powder 2 ts ground coriander 2 ts garam masala 2 ts turmeric 2 ts ground cumin 2 ts ground ginger 1-2 cups vegetable stock For Serving 1 Tbsp salt 1/2 lime Naan Instructions Wash lentils thoroughly Heat up pan, add some oil, glaze onion and garlic Add spices, fry until fragrant Put everything to slow cooker, cook on low for 8 hours Before serving season with salt, add juice of lime
